entry.title: RT kairon: Got some $CODE to give for anyone interested in joining @developer_dao Looking for someone who's enthusiastic and ready to bring positive v...
entry.summary: RT kairon Got some $CODE to give for anyone interested in joining @developer_dao Looking for someone who's enthusiastic and ready to bring positive vibes to a community I hold in very high regards Sahra: @lemmynjaria @developer_dao @pbillingsby_eth A couple of ways I am aware of: 1. Buy a D4R NFT: 2. Apply for the scholarship for a free D4R NFT: 3. Buy 400 $CODE 4. Someone gifts you D4R NFT or 400 $CODE. Check out @womenbuildweb3 and @codingwithmanny for that. https://opensea.io/collection/devs-for-revolution https://developerdao.notion.site/Apply-for-a-Scholarship-08e941bb537549bbb52657c01f6b87fe

entry.title: RT nagma 🥐: Can't believe this day is here! It's been wild seeing Developer DAO explode to what it has become today. Eternally grateful that I was ...
entry.summary: RT nagma 🥐 Can't believe this day is here! It's been wild seeing Developer DAO explode to what it has become today. Eternally grateful that I was able to spend that time in the beginning, learn and end up with my current gig because of it🫶 hope to someday contribute again! Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): From its inception, Developer DAO sought to be a space rooted in people who want to educate, and who want to build. After months of hard work, our new governance token $CODE has officially launched today 🥳 blog post: thread 👇 🧵 #CODEdrop https://devdao.mirror.xyz/lGRLUA7wXZP2Rs5TxPRDks7Ho4yjSRUFLGNRfxeAz80
